titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent by Mr. D.T. to Mr. John Vicars (Mr. Prynns second) in answer to his letter sent by him to Mr. John Goodwin.
titleStmt.author: D. T.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print at foot of page.
Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge) Library.
